character.description: The original person from this spirit come from was one of the most revered knights from his dimension. Here, meanwhile, while still with strict code of honor, Spark has one small problem: He doesn’t know how to read or write, less count to more than ten. The world around him is totally crazy, for him, and he tries to demonstrate by example how the stuff must be done, but nobody is going to hear him, as long as he doesn’t know how to write his own name.

Ginny may look as a carefree person who always says what she thinks, but she deeply cares about everybody. She tries to be nice with everybody she meets but if you feel bad for anything she said, she will be the first one depressed about it. She tries to look always happy and with no-worries, but she’s always worried and always trying to be a better person.
